# Item

**Associated Type**

The type of the item that’s being transferred.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Item : Transferable
```

## Implementing a transfer representation

- **body**: A builder expression that describes the process of importing and exporting an item.
- **Body**: The transfer representation for the item.

items.description: A builder expression that describes the process of importing and exporting an item.
items.name: body

items.description: The transfer representation for the item.
